text: Jevha (hajarata) musa (alai.) Yanni mudata purna keli ani apalya kutumbiyanna ghe'una nighale, tevha tura navacya parvatakade aga pahili. Apalya patnila mhanale, thamba! Mi aga pahili ahe. Phara sambhava ahe ki mi tethuna ekhadi batami anavi kinva agica nikhara (vistava) anava, yasathi ki tumhi sekuna ghyave
